Rewritten Clause:
In the event that either Merck Serono SA or Merck KGaA are required to provide additional reports, such obligation shall be solely at their discretion and may be fulfilled partially or completely as they deem fit, without any liability to the Issuer or Designated Filer. In other words, these entities retain full control over their reporting obligations under this agreement.
